p.k: Gumball destroys Alan and Carmen's relationship and has to reunite them. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called "A Pony's Tail" to watch with Anais, but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Granny JoJo's overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin befriend Clayton, who is a compulsive liar and begins contaminating them with lies.
